name: AI Prospect Research to Outreach Workflow
description: Automated pipeline from prospect research to sequence creation

steps.name: AI Prospect Research
steps.ai_instructions: Research prospects matching criteria. Extract: company pain points, recent news, technology stack, growth signals, key initiatives, decision maker info, personalization angles.

steps.name: AI Email Sequence Creation
steps.ai_instructions: Create 5-email cold outreach sequence using research data. Include: personalized opening, specific pain point, value proposition, social proof, clear CTA. Use {{first_name}} and {{account.name}} variables.
